title: Lower priority que
body: Hey, I sat through 5 20 minute ques because your client crashed during the loadout, even though I returned as soon as I could and finished the game (Actually carried it). Now your client crashed only once during champ select and I have to wait a half an hour!! Please take me off this que, its not my fault the client crashed. My cpu never had a problem with this before the new client beta!!

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we're unable to modify these penalties for any reason. A large reason for this is because regardless of the reason for your absence, **everyone** in the match is negatively impacted. 

It sounds like your issues stem from a poor connection to our servers, so I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address common solutions for this. Please let me know if you continue to experience issues after taking those steps.
